UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The C-Terminus of Panusin, a Lobster β-Defensin, Is Crucial for Optimal Antimicrobial Activity and Serum Stability
Literature.Author: Bello-Madruga R, Valle J, Jiménez MÁ, Torrent M, Montero-Alejo V, Andreu D

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Horse erythrocytes:1.7±0.08% Hemolysis=250 µM,Human fibroblasts MRC-5:IC50=175±1.5 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(MBC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=6.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MBC=6.3µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 15308(MIC=6.3µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 15308(MBC=12.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MBC=6.3µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=6.3µM),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MBC=6.3µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 15307(MIC=3.1µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 15307(MBC=3.1µM)
